## Buckets.withUserAuth() method

Creates a new gRPC client instance for accessing the Textile Buckets API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static withUserAuth(auth: UserAuth, host?: string, debug?: boolean): Buckets;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  auth | UserAuth | The user auth object. |
